Transparency.findings: Merck provides concrete, detailed evidence of transparency in its AI practices, including a dedicated AI principles document, research blogs, and transcripts describing transparent data use and communication. The company's Code of Conduct and public-facing web pages reinforce commitments to model transparency and open disclosure of research processes.

Fairness & Bias Mitigation.findings: Merck's AI principles and ESG reports provide detailed descriptions of fairness and bias mitigation practices, including pay equity studies, bias prevention, and health equity initiatives. These documents offer concrete evidence of systematic efforts to address fairness in both organizational and AI-specific contexts.

summary.overallFindings: Merck & Co., Inc. demonstrates comprehensive, publicly documented responsible AI practices across all seven pillars. The company provides detailed evidence of transparency, fairness, explainability, oversight, privacy, governance, and public commitments through AI principles, ESG reports, case studies, and policy statements. No significant gaps were identified, and Merck's responsible AI approach is robust and well-supported by concrete, verifiable sources.
